programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe. We are again sending cameras to the edge of the solar system giving us new insights into the evolution of our worlds.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its the city of love, Paris, France. The world over knows its most famous structure, the Eiffel Tower! But did you know PARISIANS originally wanted to tear it down! Well explain why and how it was saved! Then, youll visit Americas FIRST PIZZERIA! And how the gourmet ice cream HAAGEN DAZS got its exotic start in Bronx New York!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: It is April, and large groups of blacktip and tiger sharks are gathering off the South African Coast. They are waiting for the onset of one of natures most spectacular mass migrations: the annual sardine run. Like the cold ocean current that gives rise to the extraordinary numbers of African pilchards and their predators during the Sardine Run, the frigid Benguela current that runs northwards along the arid coastline of Namibia also supports a remarkable diversity of life. Monk parakeets are highly sociable, quirky South American parrots, but unlike all other parrots, they build complex nesting structures that can reach the size of a car, with individual compartments for each nesting pair. South American parakeets arent the only birds turned architects: the social weaver birds of southern Africa also construct permanent nests on trees, large enough to house dozens of bird families, often stretching across several generations at a time. Like the weaverbirds, bats, too, tend to roost in large numbers. At this time of year, mothers and their young form part of the colony, with the young clinging closely to the front of their mothers until there are weaned at 6 months of age. In the Thong Pha Phoom National Park in Thailand, a pair of greater coucals have built a nest and laid a clutch of 4 eggs. By now, massive shoals of around 10 million Southern African Pilchards have gathered in the coastal waters of South Africa and begun their migration northwards. Like the dolphins during the Sardine Run, lions tend to work in teams when hunting large prey like buffalo. And right now, the need for the Xakanaxa pride to hunt and provide for their expanding family is greater than ever: they have new cubs to feed. A group of meerkats in South Africa is also busily caring for their growing family. Most of the clan has already left the family burrow to forage for insects and other small prey. In the Okavango Deltas grassland, a pair of puff adders is engaged in a lengthy mating ritual.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears explores the Great Barrier Reef starting on the Queensland mainland taking a boat out to Hervey Bay with whale expert Wally Franklin. They witness a mother hump back whale teaching her three month old calf the whale moves needed to survive the long migration to Antarctica.He flies out to Lady Elliot Island at the southernmost tip of the Great Barrier Reef where he goes scuba diving on the coral reef and discovers giant turtles and manta rays and shoals of big eyed trevelly fish.Back on the island Ray helps marine biologist Maggie ONeal plant a Pisonia tree and finds out how the Pisonia trees kill the Black Noddy birds that nest in them in order to use their corpses as a fertile compost given the unforgiving ground of a coral island.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears journeys into the remote wilderness region of Arnhem land to the Cooper Creek Billabong. Hes there during the dry season and all the wild life is concentrated into a narrow stretch of water. He comes face to face with the dominant saltwater crocodile and watches as the croc manoeuvres a dead pig down river to a secret hiding place. When Ray gets too close warns him off.Ray travels into Stone Country above the Billabong where he finds a gallery of ancient Aboriginal art and joins locals Connie Nayinggul and her grandson Moses on a fishing expedition. They catch a barramundi and cook the fish in a traditional ground oven using paper bark.Finally Ray travels with land manager Greg Towns across the dried up mudflats through giant flocks of Magpie Geese. Ray helps Greg to burn away large meadows of alien and destructive grass that is killing the birds. In a dramatic scene Ray witnesses the spectacle of farming with fire.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial - a predator - that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia - a Tiger Quoll - smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Federica the turtle has arrived from Italy after a run in with a container ship. Loro Parques offered to be her forever home, but how will she go sharing her new digs with others? Youve heard of a fish out of water - try a turtle! Esmeralda the iguana has a lumpy belly and Jorge the vet is worried. Hes hoping its a bounty of eggs but knows he shouldnt count his iguanas before they hatch. Its fingers crossed for some scaly babies!

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Hes known as the "Birdman of Loro Parque" and Rafa, the Loro Parque Foundation Scientific Director wears the badge with pride. Every day he surrounds himself with all things ornithological - from parrots and puffins to penguins. But its what hes carrying through the zoo that brings all the birds to the yard. Any guesses? Youve heard of the film "How to train your Dragon" - today Inaki has to try and train an anteater (and hes not sure whats proving easier)! With anteaters being the stubborn but sensitive types, Inakis digging deep into his bag of tricks - beginning with the old favourite, some vanilla yoghurt. Will Sue-Anne the anteater succumbs to Inakis tasty charms or will she thumb her (rather long) nose at him instead?

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

Flora Coquerel, a Franco-Beninese woman and the winner of MissFrance 2014, invites us to follow them in their intense and globalised life for a success story - how the colours of a simple fabric have become the symbol of the cultural melting pot of an entire generation!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechnen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Knutsford Crown Court. As they delve deeper into the building, will the ghosts and spirits make contact through Derek?

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Carnfield Hall is a country house dating from the 15th and 16th Centuries. This private residence turn event hall is using its paranormal activity to draw in business. Are these spirits the old residents?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files

Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We travel to the end of the rainbow in Dublin, Ireland. Well gawk at the Book of Kells, a holy book displayed at Trinity College. We visited the hallowed halls of St. Patricks Cathedral, and touched famed Irishman, Daniel OConnells crypt at Glasnevin Cemetery. Finally, we learn the complicated history of Irish independence at Kilmainham jail.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: One of the 7 Natural Wonders of the World, Victoria Falls is an amazing spectacle that straddles the Zambia/Zimbabwe border. The force of the water is so intense that the water bouncing back creates a rainforest. Remarkably, the wildlife in the area is as abundant as the water going over the falls.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Once a year in good rain years, the deserts of South Africa explode in color. This is the greatest flower bloom in the world. We venture into the desert to experience this first-hand and film the rare animals that call this arid land home.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Its island living in the Keys on this episode of TTH. We learn about the islands treasure hunting history at the Mel Fisher Museum. Then well explore Fort Jefferson, an isolated fort in the Gulf of Mexico that defended the islands. American literature enthusiasts will enjoy a look at Ernest Hemingways Key West home, where some of his most famous works were penned.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We head underground and visit the Hidee Gold Mine to see how this most precious material is obtained. Then we get a tour of the brand new History Colorado Center where well explore Colorados past through first hand stories and interactive attractions.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit. Jupiter is 5.2 AU distant and Pluto up to 48AU, the solar system extends far beyond this into interstellar space. We humans cannot yet travel that sort of distance, however w e can and do send our robots and probes in our place; and the results are astounding.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere. If so one space program would have to remain. The planetary defence program, to locate identify and deflect a wayward asteroid from hitting Earth and destroying our civilzation because at last count there were 15,000 possible dangerous candidates close to Earth.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Over one hundred years ago, two young Argentinian daredevil pilots, Eduardo Bradley and Angel Zuloaga, decided to attempt the first hazardous crossing of the Andes aboard an unreliable balloon. Achieving an altitude of more than 8,000 metres, the pair managed to fly from Chile to Argentina. This docu-series chronicles their adventures and tries to recreate the same journey using the same technique and facing similar challenges.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its been sweetening America for almost 40 years! Now, find out the truth behind how SWEET N LOW actually got its name! And why do we yell SHOTGUN when getting into a car with friends? Then, is it really bad luck to open an umbrella in the house? And, learn the salty truth on how the POTATO CHIP was invented out of ANGER!

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Diamond River Hunters
programme.desc: Peter and his team return to Lesotho once more to pursue their dreams of finding big diamonds. The rainy season is supposed to be over but they have to make their way down the dangerous mountain roads during a violent hailstorm. They setup the mining operation again after a 3 month break, but the machinery is rusted and they battle to get the TLB running. To combat the technical problems they had last time, a new team member has been recruited: Alan, a pump specialist. They have also brought up a bigger CAT earthmover and a Hopper has been specially constructed to turn over more ground. They have invested heavily in new machinery to try and increase productivity, but still face daily technical problems. The investors all have concerns about Gary, who is looking extremely thin and haggard after the break. They begin to suspect he may have a drug problem. The new CAT is delivered to the mining site, but it breaks down on the first day. Mining resumes once Kim and Alan get the pumps up and running, and the CAT is repaired by Warren. The rivers rise after heavy rains and the team are unable to cross the first river. The CAT becomes stuck trying to get up the riverbank. They try to dig their way out, but it doesnt work and the CAT becomes trapped in the river. A site for the hopper is found and it is a huge combined effort to get it assembled. As they complete the task, they are hit by a huge storm and a flash flood tears through the mining site. The miners scramble to save the machinery from being swept away by the rising water. Rob and Peter confront Gary about his work ethic and drug use. At first Gary denies this, but then admits that he has been using drugs. He is not in good shape and claims to be sick but Rob is convinced that his drug problem is keeping him from work. He is not aware that a decision has already been made to fire him. Warren takes it upon himself to break the bad news to Gary. He leaves after an emotional farewell with Warren. The inlet hose is fitted to the hopper and the team are optimistic about its ability to move more ground once it is operational. Peter has some luck at the sorting table and finds a small, but valuable diamond.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. The northern, windward side receives three fourths of all precipitation, which is why it is green year round. The significant differences in elevation also contribute to the great contrasts, as do the mountain ranges extending through the middle of the island. You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Life on planet Earth is a fragile enough proposition as it is. The Earth is an interconnected system, everything is dependent on everything else, and we as a species should learn how to avoid making things worse than they need to be. In this rather sobering instalment of Desperate Hours our special focus is on Environmental Disasters. We will explore what has actually been done to protect the environment in contrast to the long discussions on this topic. From polluting the planet in various ways to the effects of global warming we contemplate how our future might be affected. As custodians of the planet, are we not better to be safe, rather than sorry?

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Volcanoes, earthquakes, tidal waves, and fires. Cataclysmic events that are capable of wiping out thousands of lives in a terribly short space of time. Then there are epidemics and pandemics, particularly chilling in their own way, because they literally and figuratively get under the skin. Lets not forget man-made disasters, the industrial accidents and environmental disasters that highlight all that is worst about our presence on this fragile blue green planet. And what is more frightening than a nuclear calamity? Accidents on the road, on rail, in the air and at sea, well, may not have quite the same deadly power as volcanoes or earthquakes; but they hold their own terrors, and are responsible for 1000s of fatalities every year. In this sobering yet thrilling final instalment of Desperate Hours we will take a look at some of the worst of the worst.

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: Yemen, Chaos in Silence
programme.desc: After three years of war, Yemen is facing its worst humanitarian crisis since the end of World War II. Yemen, chaos in silence"" is an unprecedented journey that tells the story of a conflict that is unfolding virtually without outside witnesses. From Aden in the south to Sanaa in the north, via Taez, the front line, this film explores a devastated country, eroded by political and religious divisions and ravaged by cholera.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The history of the British Empire colonial legacy in Northern Ireland is well known the world over but a there is a largely untold story of the the firefights between and close quarter battles exchanged between the provisional IRA, the British army and the elite SAS. Although the IRA often employed "terrorist" techniques within the city of london and on Englands mainland not much is said of the often guerilla warfare techniques of the British Special Air Service in Northern Ireland since the beginning of this conflict. In this episode we will examine how the history of the Special Air Service affected the training of every elite force after it and how the close quarter battles in Northern Ireland in the late 1970s through to the millennium shaped both special forces and resistance methods.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Sieva apgalvo, ka viņa pamodusies, un tikai tad atklājusi, ka viņas vīrs ir nošauts, kaut arī viņa gulēja viņam blakus. Viņa neko neesot dzirdējusi vai redzējusi, bet policija to apšauba. Vai viņa ir šokēta un sērojoša atraitne vai viltīga slepkava ar slēptiem plāniem?

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša izskata lietu ar Saseksas putnu audzētāju, kurš 1924. gadā apraka savas līgavas līķi, bet apgalvoja, ka nav viņu nogalinājis. Viņa tiesas procesā divi izcili patologi nebija vienisprātis par nāves cēloni.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Sieva apgalvo, ka viņa pamodusies, un tikai tad atklājusi, ka viņas vīrs ir nošauts, kaut arī viņa gulēja viņam blakus. Viņa neko neesot dzirdējusi vai redzējusi, bet policija to apšauba. Vai viņa ir šokēta un sērojoša atraitne vai viltīga slepkava ar slēptiem plāniem?

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Policija atrod grūtnieci Dženiju Vebu pakārušos - it kā acīmredzama pašnāvība netālu no nomaļa grāvja. Tomēr mīlas trijstūra atšķetināšana novirza izmeklēšanu jaunā un šokējošā virzienā.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Liktenīgs noziegums paliek neatrisināts. Lieta nonāk strupceļā, līdz apņēmīgs detektīvs aizdomās sāk turēt algotu slepkavu. Policisti plāno slepenu operāciju, lai identificētu vainīgo, tomēr viņiem ir tikai viena iespēja viņu notvert.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kad trīs bērnu tēvs tiek nonāvēts uz sava lieveņa, Gvinetas apgabala slepkavību izmeklēšanas birojs atklāj, ka viņa tuvākie cilvēki slēpj tumšu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Aukstasinīga slepkavu dueta medības stiepjas no mazas pilsētiņas Aiovas štatā līdz Floridas Panhendlai.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Sieva apgalvo, ka viņa pamodusies, un tikai tad atklājusi, ka viņas vīrs ir nošauts, kaut arī viņa gulēja viņam blakus. Viņa neko neesot dzirdējusi vai redzējusi, bet policija to apšauba. Vai viņa ir šokēta un sērojoša atraitne vai viltīga slepkava ar slēptiem plāniem?

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša izskata lietu ar Saseksas putnu audzētāju, kurš 1924. gadā apraka savas līgavas līķi, bet apgalvoja, ka nav viņu nogalinājis. Viņa tiesas procesā divi izcili patologi nebija vienisprātis par nāves cēloni.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Policija atrod grūtnieci Dženiju Vebu pakārušos - it kā acīmredzama pašnāvība netālu no nomaļa grāvja. Tomēr mīlas trijstūra atšķetināšana novirza izmeklēšanu jaunā un šokējošā virzienā.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Liktenīgs noziegums paliek neatrisināts. Lieta nonāk strupceļā, līdz apņēmīgs detektīvs aizdomās sāk turēt algotu slepkavu. Policisti plāno slepenu operāciju, lai identificētu vainīgo, tomēr viņiem ir tikai viena iespēja viņu notvert.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kad trīs bērnu tēvs tiek nonāvēts uz sava lieveņa, Gvinetas apgabala slepkavību izmeklēšanas birojs atklāj, ka viņa tuvākie cilvēki slēpj tumšu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Aukstasinīga slepkavu dueta medības stiepjas no mazas pilsētiņas Aiovas štatā līdz Floridas Panhendlai.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad sludinātāja sievaZiemeļkarolīnā tiek atrasta noslepkavota, policijai ir jānoskaidro ne tikai tas, kurš varētu vēlēties viņas nāvi, bet arī tas, vai daži draudzes locekļi sēro vai mēģina slēpt savu daļu vardarbīgajā noziegumā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izskata lietu ar juristu un bijušo armijas majoru, kurš tika pakārts par savas sievas saindēšanu ar arsēnu 1921. gadā.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus veca meitene atklāj, ka viņas māte pēc maiņas Lasvegasas kazino mājās ir nežēlīgi piekauta līdz nāvei. Policija izmanto novērošanas kameru ierakstus, cerot atklāt slepkavas.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Skatītāji tiek iepazīstināti ar Dalijas Dipolito - divdesmit sešus gadus vecās eskorta meitenes - tiesas prāvām, kuras kļuva par bēdīgi slaveno femme fatale un mediju sensāciju. Viņai tika izvirzītas apsūdzības par uzmākšanos sava vīra Maika slepkavībai.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā izmeklētājiem ir jauni aizdomās turamie. Krustojuma vidū pie lidostas atrod neidentificētu velosipēdistu, kurš ir nošauts.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Mācītāja dēli izdara nāves grēku mīlestības pret naudu dēļ. Tas šokē cieši saliedēto reliģisko kopienu Ziemeļkarolīnā.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Ģimenes locekļi izmisīgi meklē pazudušu Virdžīnijas pusaudzi, nezinot, ka policijai ir noslēpums: viņi ir atraduši viņa ķermeni, taču atsakās izpaust šo informāciju, jo ir aizdomas par neparastu motīvu.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs izmeklē kāda Notingemas aprūpes nama iemītnieka saindēšanos ar morfiju 1935. gadā, par ko tika notiesāts un pakārts pansionāta īpašnieks.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Slepkava 193 reizes sadur savu uzticīgo tēvu Džefu Raitu un apglabā viņu viņa paša mājas pagalmā. Izmeklētāji pārbauda viņa pagātni, cenšoties atrast vainīgo.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Greizsirdība un apsēstība sasniedz kulmināciju - īpašniecisks narcissists ratiņkrēslā izstrādā metodisku plānu nogalināt savu neko nenojaušošo bijušo draudzeni.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Jauna māte un viņas labākā draudzene tiek nošautas gaišā dienas laikā, izraisot notikumu ķēdi, ko Talsas izmeklētāji nekad nebūtu iedomājušies.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Izmeklētāji saista mirušas sievietes līķi nodegušā transportlīdzeklī ar sazvērestību, kurā iesaistīti divi tiesīgi, augstprātīgi brāļi miljonāri.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Ģimenes locekļi izmisīgi meklē pazudušu Virdžīnijas pusaudzi, nezinot, ka policijai ir noslēpums: viņi ir atraduši viņa ķermeni, taču atsakās izpaust šo informāciju, jo ir aizdomas par neparastu motīvu.

programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Als atgriežas mājās no darba ar punu uz galvas, viņš redz (vai domā, ka redz) sešus mazus zaļus citplanētiešus, kas nokāpj uz Zemes un nozog viņa smirdīgās zeķes, lai tās izmantotu kā degvielu saviem kosmosa kuģiem. Vienīgā problēma ir tā, ka viņus neredz neviens cits, izņemot Alu, tāpēc visi domā, ka viņš ir traks, kad stāsta citiem, ka viņus redzējis.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als nolemj veidot sakņu dārzu, bet drīz vien saskaras ar visaptverošu karu ar trusi, kurš nozog viņam burkānus un citus dārzeņus.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Glorijai ir aizdomas par Džeju - viņš sapnī saka "mazulis". Fils un Klēra izspiego Heiliju, Lūku un Meniju. Mičels nelabprāt dalās ar sulīgām tenkām ar Kameronu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fila un Gilas Torpu nesaskaņas sasniedz jaunu līmeni. Ģimeni piemeklē utu uzliesmojums. Heilija un Aleksa ieslodzītas pagrabā. Menijs un Glorija ir apmulsuši skolas ekskursijas laikā.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts joprojām atgūstas no situācijas ar vērsi. Viņš uzzina, ka viņam jāpavada vēl trīs nedēļas kopā ar Frenku un Mariju, pirms varēs pārvākties atpakaļ uz savu dzīvokli. Viņš ir kaprīzs un izturas augstprātīgi. Debra cenšas savu dzimšanas dienu padarīt svinīgu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Klāt tas mēneša laiks, kad Debra un Rejs staigā pa olu čaumalām, lai izvairītos no garastāvokļa svārstībām. Roberta, Frenka un velnu mudināts, Rejs nopērk tabletes, kurām vajadzētu uzlabot viņas garastāvokli. Debra nav apmierināta.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Skrentonas filiāle izveido komiteju, lai atrastu nākamo priekšnieku, taču intervēto personu loks izrādās mazāk nekā iespaidīgs. Dvaits pieprasa interviju, neskatoties uz viņa negadījumu ar ieroci.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Skrentonas filiāle izveido komiteju, lai atrastu nākamo priekšnieku, taču intervēto personu loks izrādās mazāk nekā iespaidīgs. Dvaits pieprasa interviju, neskatoties uz viņa negadījumu ar ieroci.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks liek Marijai aizvest viņu pie ārsta, taču joka dēļ viņam divas reizes tiek veikta viena un tā pati procedūra; skolā Durbins un Helēna apkauno sevi, un bērni sacenšas par klases augstākajiem tituliem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Skola gatavojas ziemas brīvlaikam. Džeks mēģina ierakstīt lekciju cenšoties pavērt ceļu uz Viskonsinas Universitātes filozofijas nodaļu; neapmierināts un nespējot pabeigt video, viņš aizmieg un sāk sapņot murgus.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Atgriezies skolotājs nozog Kema slavu viņa organizētajās dejās. Mičels atklāj, ka viņa jaunais priekšnieks ir ļauns. Heilija kopā ar Filu dodas uz balvu pasniegšanas ceremoniju. Džejs un Glorija cenšas panākt, lai Lilija atzīstas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Glorija un Klēra ved Liliju pirkt kleitu. Džejs māca Lūkam kokapstrādi. Kamerons mēģina izkļūt no muzeja ceļojuma. Fils palīdz Endijam izveidot video savai draudzenei, kas Heilijas ieskatā ir tizli.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kad Als bez krekla no kaimiņu zāliena noceļ dīvānu, viņš negaidīti iemanto jaunu reputāciju apkaimes sieviešu vidū. Esot pašpārliecinātam, viņš sāk iet dušā un valkāt elegantas drēbes, un viņa sniegums darbā ievērojami uzlabojas, kā arī veicinās viņa popularitāte starp dāmām. Lieki piebilst, ka Pegija ir greizsirdīga un nemierīga, taču viņa nezina, kā uz to reaģēt - viņas vīrs uzvedas ļoti ne kā Als.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Nogurusi no tā, ka Als pavada viņas randiņus pa durvīm, "pieaugusī" Kellija tiek pie sava dzīvokļa.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts joprojām atgūstas no situācijas ar vērsi. Viņš uzzina, ka viņam jāpavada vēl trīs nedēļas kopā ar Frenku un Mariju, pirms varēs pārvākties atpakaļ uz savu dzīvokli. Viņš ir kaprīzs un izturas augstprātīgi. Debra cenšas savu dzimšanas dienu padarīt svinīgu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Klāt tas mēneša laiks, kad Debra un Rejs staigā pa olu čaumalām, lai izvairītos no garastāvokļa svārstībām. Roberta, Frenka un velnu mudināts, Rejs nopērk tabletes, kurām vajadzētu uzlabot viņas garastāvokli. Debra nav apmierināta.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Atgriezies skolotājs nozog Kema slavu viņa organizētajās dejās. Mičels atklāj, ka viņa jaunais priekšnieks ir ļauns. Heilija kopā ar Filu dodas uz balvu pasniegšanas ceremoniju. Džejs un Glorija cenšas panākt, lai Lilija atzīstas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Glorija un Klēra ved Liliju pirkt kleitu. Džejs māca Lūkam kokapstrādi. Kamerons mēģina izkļūt no muzeja ceļojuma. Fils palīdz Endijam izveidot video savai draudzenei, kas Heilijas ieskatā ir tizli.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts ir atguvis spēku un ir kopā ar Eimiju. Bet kaut kas joprojām nav kārtībā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Atskats uz laiku, kad Roberts izšķīrās.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Jaunais Dunder Mifflin izpilddirektors Roberts Kalifornija atstājis lapu, kuras vidū ir līnija. Tās abās pusēs ir darbinieku vārdi, liekot ikvienam mēģināt saprast, ko tas nozīmē.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Pakļaujoties Roberta spiedienam palielināt pārdošanas apjomu, Endijs piedāvā personāla stimulēšanas programmu. Tā viņam atspēlējas, kad viņš piedāvā ļoti personisku galveno balvu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kamēr tiek atkāts Entonija noslēpums, Helēnai ar Durbina palīdzību jāpārvar veipošanas problēma.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kamēr pārējā pilsēta gatavojas Toledo ikgadējā Keitijas Holmas dienas svinībām, Džeks un Marisa plāno sabojāt svētku konkursu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Lasvegasu Džejs mēģina dabūt labāku istabu. Klēra mēģina atgūt pagājušajā gadā zaudēto naudu. Fils cenšas iekļūt burvju klubā, bet Kamerons izvēlas vecpuišu ballīti, nevis spa dienu kopā ar Mičelu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džeja plāni organizēt ģimenes vakaru ir nogājuši no sliedēm. Fils nonāk grūtībās, mēģinot pārdot Glorijas veco dzīvokli. Mičels neapstiprina Kamerona tēva radīto kāzu elementu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Ala tēvocis vecpuisis pēc nāves atstājis 500 000 dolārus pirmajam no saviem radiniekiem, kas dzemdēts viņa vārdā nosauktu jaundzimušo. Als pārvar savu ierasto nepatiku pret seksu ar Pegu. Viņam nezinot, viņa slepeni turpina lietot tabletes, lai Als turpinātu gribēt seksu. Viņa nolēmusi, ka trešā grūtniecība nav to vērta.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc dzeršanas baņķieru ballītē Mārsija atklāj, ka ir precējusies ar noslēpumainu Džefersonu DArsiju, kuru Als redz kā žigolo un blēdi. Lai Mārsija justos labāk par šīm negaidītajām pārmaiņām savā dzīvē, Pegija nolemj organizēt Mārsijas un Džefersona oficiālu kāzu ceremoniju Bandiju pagalmā. Šajā ceremonijā nekas nenotiek, kā plānots.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Komisārs Rikardi
programme.desc: Tekstilizstrādājumu tirgotājs tiek nogalināts. Šķiet, ka to varētu būt paveicis vīrietis, kas iemīlējies viņa sievā. Tomēr Rikardi uzskata citādāk. Manfreds plāno bildināt Enriku.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Londonas baznīcā tiek atrasti divi līķi ar pārgrieztām rīklēm — bezpajumtnieks un aristokrātisks parlamenta pārstāvis. Dalgliešam nākas atcerēties savas personiskās traģēdijas, lai atbruņotu slepkavu.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pēc vikāra sievas Bekas un suņu staidzinātājas Sjūzijas iesaistīšanās izmeklēšanā trijotne atklāj nozīmīgus pierādījumus, kas ļauj izdarīt kādu šokējošu atklājumu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad jurista nāve tiek uzdota par suņa uzbrukumu, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka vainīgajiem ir vajadzīgs suns, kas mantojis milzīgu summu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoka kaimiņiene Tipija Longfelova pārliecina viņu izmeklēt lietu, kurā nozaudēta vēstule ar nāves draudiem.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Pēdējā sērijā Elīza atklāj, kurš un kāpēc nogalināja viņas tēvu. Galvenais aizdomās turamais ir Mozus, tomēr atklājas, ka īstais slepkava visu laiku ir bijis Hercoga acu priekšā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ielejā iestājies pavasaris. Džeimss atgriežas Daroubijā, viņa prātu pārņēmusi Helēna un jāpieņem neiespējams lēmums. Tikmēr Tristanam ir jāsaprot, vai patiesība vienmēr ir labākā izvēle.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izsaukta no piekrastes mājām, lai pieprasītu savu noslēpumaino mantojumu, jaunā un ārprātīgā Peregrīna Fišere atklāj pasauli un mantojumu, ko atstājusi viņas tante Frīna.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens burvju mākslinieks ir kā iekritis akā. Visa Londona apspriež šo noslēpumu, un kāda avīze nolīgst Elīzu veikt izmeklēšanu, neskatoties uz to, ka pie šīs lietas jau strādā Hercogs.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Tristans palīdz Zigfrīdam ar sarežģītu klientu un atgādina par to, kāds kādreiz bija viņš pats. Džeimss cer, ka pavasara ballē notikumi ar Helēnu virzīsies uz priekšu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad jurista nāve tiek uzdota par suņa uzbrukumu, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka vainīgajiem ir vajadzīgs suns, kas mantojis milzīgu summu.

programme.desc: Mērdoka kaimiņiene Tipija Longfelova pārliecina viņu izmeklēt lietu, kurā nozaudēta vēstule ar nāves draudiem.

programme.title: Inspektors Džordžs Džentlijs
programme.desc: Galvenais inspektors Džordžs Džentlijs, policists ar spēcīgu taisnīguma izjūtu, strādā, lai atrisinātu noziegumus Nortamberlendā. Viņam palīdz jaunais seržants Bakhs.

programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija tiek uzaicinātas palīdzēt policijai kā konsultantes un atklāj kādu svarīgu saikni starp slepkavībām.

programme.title: Inspektors Džordžs Džentlijs
programme.desc: Galvenais inspektors Džordžs Džentlijs, policists ar spēcīgu taisnīguma izjūtu, strādā, lai atrisinātu noziegumus Nortamberlendā. Viņam palīdz jaunais seržants Bakhs.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka kāda vīra nāve ir saistīta ar līdzekļu izšķērdēšanu hidroelektrostacijas projektā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks zina, ka Takera slepkavību organizēja Tonijs Petruči, tomēr situāciju saasina gangstera bēgšana.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūditas pagātnes noslēpums var tikt atklāts, un trijotnei ir jāpaspēj notvert slepkava, pirms nav par vēlu.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Soames pasūta Filam izolētas lauku mājas būvniecību, neskatoties uz Irēnas teikto, ka viņu laulība būtu jāuzskata par neizdevušos. Džoilons dodas pie Luīzas, bet Annai piedzimst vēl viens mazdēls.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids aptaujā ekscentriskus kaimiņus un uzzina par noslēpumainā zēna talantiem. Terēza turpina izmeklēšanu vienatnē, bet Žans Pjērs risina pagātnes problēmas un satiek Filipu.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: 1850-tie gadi: bezbailīgā un ziņkārīgā Miss Skārleta vada tēva detektīvaģentūru ar inspektora Velingtona (Hercoga), kalpones Aivijas un Mozus palīdzību.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Jaunas atraitnes liktenis rada sarežģījumus Džeimsa un Helēnas romantiskajās attiecībās, bet Trikija Vū apmeklējums izraisa haosu Skeldeilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka kāda vīra nāve ir saistīta ar līdzekļu izšķērdēšanu hidroelektrostacijas projektā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks zina, ka Takera slepkavību organizēja Tonijs Petruči, tomēr situāciju saasina gangstera bēgšana.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kāds draugs Dalgliešu uzaicina uz Dorsetu, kur viņš noskaidro, ka draugs un kāds netālu esošā pansionāta iedzīvotājs nesen tika noslepkavoti. Dalgliešs ir pārliecināts, ka nāves ir saistītas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: 1850-tie gadi: bezbailīgā un ziņkārīgā Miss Skārleta vada tēva detektīvaģentūru ar inspektora Velingtona (Hercoga), kalpones Aivijas un Mozus palīdzību.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūditas pagātnes noslēpums var tikt atklāts, un trijotnei ir jāpaspēj notvert slepkava, pirms nav par vēlu.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kāds draugs Dalgliešu uzaicina uz Dorsetu, kur viņš noskaidro, ka draugs un kāds netālu esošā pansionāta iedzīvotājs nesen tika noslepkavoti. Dalgliešs ir pārliecināts, ka nāves ir saistītas.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss iegādājas rentgena iekārtu, neskatoties uz Zigfrīda iebildumiem. Zigfrīda romantiskie piedzīvojumi satrauc cieminiekus, Dženija piesakās māsu skolā, apbēdinot Helēnu un Ričardu.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad Gvenda Holideja ievācas savā sapņu mājoklī, viņa sāk redzēt spokus. Pēc tam atklājas, ka Gvenda uzauga šajā namā — un mistērija kļūst draudīgāka.

programme.desc: Džūditas pagātnes noslēpums var tikt atklāts, un trijotnei ir jāpaspēj notvert slepkava, pirms nav par vēlu.

Comprehensive coverage of news from the world of business, finance, politics and current affairs presented in a constantly updated and supplemented version from midday onwards.

programme.title: Pasaules čempionāts snūkerā. Siņtuns Žao vs Marks Dž. Viljamss
programme.desc: Coverage of the Snooker World Championship. The finest players from across the globe step up to the baize to compete in this prestigious competition. The tournament has been held in Sheffields iconic Crucible Theatre since 1977.

programme.title: Šanhajas "Masters". Alisters Kārters vs Kairens Vilsons
programme.desc: The Shanghai Masters is a professional snooker tournament. Originally a ranking event but in 2018 it became a non-ranking invitation event. Ronnie OSullivan is the reigning champion he won the 2018 title, the first time it has been defended.

programme.desc: An exploration of the exciting world of sailing and the most important sailing events which take place all around the world. programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Atkal tu
programme.desc: Marni uzzina, ka viņas brālis gatavojas precēties un viņa līgava ir Marni vidusskolas lielākā pāridarītāja Joanna. Lai gan tagad Joanna ir pieaugusi un uzvedība cita, tomēr Marni netic, ka viņa ir mainījusies un vēlās tikai vienu, atklāt Joanna patieso seju.

programme.title: Maiņas beigas
programme.desc: Losandželosas ielas patruļas policisti Braiens un Maiks ir partneri, kas savā darbā nepazīst mērenību vai ierobežojumus. Viņu pārziņā ir ielas, kurās notiek latīņamerikāņu un melnādaino bandu asa un nežēlīga savstarpēja cīņa. Pāris reizes pāriniekiem paveicas, un viņi izjauc apjomīgus narkotiku un cilvēku tirdzniecības darījumus, tāpēc meksikāņu kartelis pasūta viņu slepkavības.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Lietains kajaka izbrauciens upē.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Atkal tu
programme.desc: Marni uzzina, ka viņas brālis gatavojas precēties un viņa līgava ir Marni vidusskolas lielākā pāridarītāja Joanna. Lai gan tagad Joanna ir pieaugusi un uzvedība cita, tomēr Marni netic, ka viņa ir mainījusies un vēlās tikai vienu, atklāt Joanna patieso seju.

programme.title: Ātrāk
programme.desc: 10 gadus pavadot cietumā, Braucējam ir bijis tikai viens mērķis - atriebt sava brāļa nāvi. Tagad viņš ir brīvībā un gatavs ķerties pie savas nāvējošās misijas, tomēr viņa ceļā stājas divi vīri - izbijis policists un jauns, egocentrisks slepkava.

programme.title: Mads
programme.desc: Salā uz Misisipi upes divi jauni zēni satiek svešinieku, kurš stāsta trakus pasakas par galvasnaudas medniekiem un kādu skaistu sievieti.

programme.title: Vilciens uz Jumu
programme.desc: 19. gadsimta beigās Arizonā tiek sagūstīts dzelzceļa laupītāju bandas vadonis Bens Veids. Pilsoņu kara veterāns un rančo īpašnieks Dens Evanss piesakās nogādāt bīstamo slepkavu uz vilcienu, kas dosies uz Jūmu, kur noziedznieku gaida tiesa. Ceļā Evanss un Veids, kas katrs pārstāv ļoti atšķirīgas pasaules, iemanto viens otra cieņu. Taču Veida banda un uz katra soļa draudošās briesmas padara to par nežēlīgu un neiespējamu katra vīra ceļu pretī savam liktenim.

programme.title: Donijs Darko
programme.desc: Izglābies no dīvaina negadījuma, nemierīgo pusaudzi nomoka vīzijas par vīrieti lielā truša uzvalkā. Viņš manipulē ar viņu, liekot veikt virkni noziegumu.

programme.title: Valkīra
programme.desc: 1944. gada 20. jūlija slepkavības un politiskā apvērsuma dramatizējums, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā veica izmisīgi renegāti Vācijas armijas virsnieki pret Ādolfu Hitleru.

programme.title: Amerikāņu afēra
programme.desc: Filmas sižeta pamatā ir septiņdesmito gadu beigās reāli notikusi speciālā operācija "Abscam", kuras laikā, lai noķertu zagtu mantu tirgoņus, bija paredzēts viņu vidē iefiltrēt FIB aģentus. Operācija izvērtās par korupcijas perēkli visos līmeņos...

programme.title: Paspēt laikā
programme.desc: Topošais tētis Pīters atrodas uz nervu sabrukuma robežas, kā arī vairāku tūkstošu kilometru attālumā no savas sievas, kurai ir palikušas piecas dienas līdz bērna nākšanai pasaulē. Un Pītera nerviem galīgi nenāk par labu apstāklis, ka garajā un neprātīgajā ceļojumā, kas viņam būs jāveic, par viņa kompanjonu kļūst godkārīgais aktieris Ītans.

programme.title: Valkīra
programme.desc: 1944. gada 20. jūlija slepkavības un politiskā apvērsuma dramatizējums, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā veica izmisīgi renegāti Vācijas armijas virsnieki pret Ādolfu Hitleru.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Saulains velobrauciens cauri Lahemā.

programme.title: Tiesības uz laimi
programme.desc: Ir 1981.gads - Kriss Gārdners ir pārliecināts, ka naudu var nopelnīt ar neatlaidību. Tomēr viņa bizness - kaulu skenēšanas aparātu tirdzniecība izrādās neveiksmīgs, jo par šo dārgo aparātu ārsti nav gatavi šķirties no milzu naudas. Kamēr Kriss diendienā apmeklē slimnīcas, lai pārdotu savu preci, viņa sieva strādā 2 maiņās, lai nodrošinātu iztiku ģimenei un mazajam dēliņam. Tomēr vairāk par naudu Kriss vēlas nodrošināt laimīgu dzīvi savam dēlam Kristoferam. Pat sievas aiziešana no ģimenes nespēj sagraut viņa cerības - viņš kļūs par brokeri. Taču apmācības kurss ilgst 6 mēnešus un tikai viens no 20 kursantiem iegūs kāroto darba vietu.

programme.title: Mazā kutināšana
programme.desc: Odeta ir 8 gadus veca meitene, kurai ārkārtīgi patīk dejot un zīmēt. Kļūstot pilngadīgai, Odeta apjauš, ka pret viņu notikusi vardarbība, tādēļ viņa pilnībā nododas dejotājas karjerai, mēģinot tikt galā ar savu pagātni.

programme.title: Tiesības uz laimi
programme.desc: Ir 1981.gads - Kriss Gārdners ir pārliecināts, ka naudu var nopelnīt ar neatlaidību. Tomēr viņa bizness - kaulu skenēšanas aparātu tirdzniecība izrādās neveiksmīgs, jo par šo dārgo aparātu ārsti nav gatavi šķirties no milzu naudas. Kamēr Kriss diendienā apmeklē slimnīcas, lai pārdotu savu preci, viņa sieva strādā 2 maiņās, lai nodrošinātu iztiku ģimenei un mazajam dēliņam. Tomēr vairāk par naudu Kriss vēlas nodrošināt laimīgu dzīvi savam dēlam Kristoferam. Pat sievas aiziešana no ģimenes nespēj sagraut viņa cerības - viņš kļūs par brokeri. Taču apmācības kurss ilgst 6 mēnešus un tikai viens no 20 kursantiem iegūs kāroto darba vietu.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.title: Lēmums aiziet
programme.desc: Izmeklētājs iepazīstas ar vīrieša nāvi kalnos. Mēģinot atšķetināt noziegumu, viņš sastop mirušā vīrieša noslēpumaino sievu.

programme.title: Patiesība par emanuēlu
programme.desc: Nomākta meitene kļūst aizņemta ar noslēpumianu kaimiņu, kam ir pārlieku aizdomīgas līdzības ar viņas mirušo māti.

programme.title: Nebraska
programme.desc: Režisors Aleksandrs Peins, kura veidotās filmas vienmēr bijušas zīmīgas ar izjustu cilvēcīgumu un stāstu, kas uzrunā plašas auditorijas, ar jaunāko filmu "Nebraska" atgriežas pie reiz aizsāktās novecošanas un vientulības tēmām. Sirmgalvja tēva un laika gaitā atsvešinājušā dēla atkaliepazīšanās stāsts tiek uzskatīts par režisora līdz šim aizkustinošāko un labāko darbu.
